thread.title: Turkish plane takes nose dive off cliff

title: Turkish plane takes nose dive off cliff
text:
Turkish plane takes nose dive off cliff 3:08pm GMT - 00:42 
A Pegasus Airlines plane skidded off the runway of a Turkish coastal airport and ended up halfway down a steep slope into the Black Sea, but no passengers or crew were hurt, Turkish media reported on Sunday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Pegasus Airlines plane skidded off the runway of a Turkish coastal airport and ended up halfway down a steep slope into the Black Sea, but no passengers or crew were hurt, Turkish media reported on Sunday.
